abstract: tallaght set to see return of st patrick 's day parade .
article: the event has been more than 18 months in the making and the first return to the town in yearstallaght is set to see the return of its st patrick 's day parade this year , as a family arts festival has been set up for this year 's celebration . it will see the parade return to main street , tallaght for the first time in several years , and has been more than 18 months in the making by a specially set-up committee . the launch of the parade and festival was held on monday , january 22 in it tallaght , with chair of the committee martha cousins , sdcc mayor paul gogarty , local politicians , community leaders , the tallaght person of the year sinead tighe and business leaders who are sponsoring the parade .

tradfest kicking off 2018 in style with stellar line-updeclan corriganvice chairman of the committee , roderick smyth , said : `` the parade will start in the grounds of it tallaght , move along the old blessington road , main st and then on to the greenhills road and end in the arts festival area located in the open grounds of it tallaght . `` we need groups and organisations to take part in both the parade and the festival . we also need volunteers and sponsors of the event . there is a role for everyone here in this parade .

finally , we need people to spread the word that the parade is back in tallaght . `` for further information on taking part , volunteering or sponsoring the parade , contact sharon byrne on tallaghtparade . festival@gmail . com or check out the st patrick 's day tallaght facebook page .
